Actions.Text: COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO RULES

Title: Sets maximum rates that may be charged for the towing and subsequent storage of a motor vehicle
Summary: Sets maximum rates that may be charged for the towing and subsequent storage of passenger and large vehicles outside of New York city.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to setting maximum rates that may be charged for the towing and subsequent storage of a motor vehicle
